text: Have you checked the email template already?

Hi y'all.

We are having issues with CSS file being truncated when published. We have a minified CSS file that we've uploaded through FTP, when we look at it in the design manager it is complete and contains all the lines of code we need.
When we publish it and look at it online it is truncated after `@media (max-width:768px)`. (the complete line is: `@media (max-width:768px){#intro-video,#video{display:none}}`).
When we remove this line and publish the changes the file is no longer truncated. Anyone know why or could help us how to solve this?
Usually indicates a syntax issue with the line following the truncation.  I recommend double checking the syntax of the code line following @media (max-width:768px)
You’re missing a semicolon “;” after display:none

Anyone else having DM problems this morning? I'm having a strange issue in the Design Manager for a certain portal where it's taking 5+ minutes to load, then there's like a 10 second delay for most click actions. Seems to only happen in certain portals though
Getting some strange JS console logs as well:
Hey <@U26BLKGE4>, mind DM-ing me a link to a portal you're seeing this in?
This looks new... any different from a flexible column?
yes, it’s the drag n drop beta

<#CDU990ECW|drag-n-drop-pages>  you should have only gotten access to this if you opted in to the beta.

The drag n drop regions are 2 directional, Horizontal AND vertical. where as flex columns are only vertical.
Ohhhh... that's useful :slightly_smiling_face: I assume my client opted in somehow
It’s useful but I personally don’t think it’s really ready for prime time yet. there are things we need as developers before this should get rolled out in full
Yeah, I just created a page from the template to test it out and it just loaded blank so... flexible columns it is for now!
just noticed that you can change the icon for a module.
that feature has been there since day one of DM2 I think.
I underutilize it, it’s a really cool feature. I just don’t have an icon set sitting around to use it with
i just accidentally hovered over it.  will have to think about this one
I've never noticed it either, I'm going to use it all the time now I think.
<https://gph.is/1KjisLm>
:exploding_head: I never noticed this either. Amazing :raised_hands::skin-tone-2:
:rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:  seriously guys!?  I swear I’m not lying, been there from the start of DM2
Lies!!
It's true. I helped user test the dm2 and it was there then
I feel like <@UD53A9UUR> goes through this phase alot <https://gph.is/1LkdefA>
haha
<@U7SL518D6> We have lots of work going into the developer experience, so don’t worry. We won’t do a wider release until we’ve answered a lot of these questions. <@U6W3H6YN8>
100% the kids
:themoreyouknow:
Anyone else having issues with page drafts and the design manager? I’ve been having a ton of really weird issues today.
When using `post_listing` is there a way to crack it open and customize the html output i.e. to bring in things like `{{ content.publish_date }}` ?
You can tweak it using JavaScript by implementing the `hsPostListingComplete` function. See <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags>
Neato, I’ll dive into that - thanks!
